name: Toothless Vampire
description:
You are Vlad, the toothless vampire. luckily enough you don't need teeth for slaying your foes.

W - Jump - Jump Midair = transform into a bat

A/D - Move

S - Dash downwards (Damages Enemies)

Left Click - Attack towards the direction you walked to last (JAM VERSION ONLY)

Escape - Main menu / End game

Space - Reset (JAM VERSION ONLY) - Attack (AFTER JAM VERSION ONLY)

Don't let your blood level run out or fall down.

You have to kill enemies, or take short rests to get blood back. To kill the enemies you need to move between platforms and for that you need your blood. Oh and and be careful, those archers can give you a rough time if not careful.

Technical
Toothless Vampire is made for GMTK game jam (Jul 17) in < 48 hours. 

How our submission matches the theme Downwell's Double Mechanics: Your health is your stamina for staying in the more mobile bat form. Your jump also serves to transform into bat form.

- Made in Game Maker Studio 2
- Sprites made with Asesprite
- BGM : https://opengameart.org/content/slow-melancholic-theme-c64-style
